subject: Re: [cc-community] introducing myself and an idea
body:

> Hallo cc-community,
>
snip
>
> I already taken the liberty to register ccvideo.org.
> I also have a colocated server I can put to use for this project and

>

> greetings
> Erik Visser

> erik@not-on.tv
> skype: epjvisser
> aim: epjvisser
> mob: 0031 (0)643544782
>
> the publicworks foundation.

>

I think I remember seeing someone using cchost for video but I can't remember 
the details right now and am in a rush.

If someone does not provide pointers by the end of the day, I will search 
around and see if I can turn up what I remember.

all the best,

drew
